name: prodeq1i
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1))
bodyPretty: ⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1)

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1), c0 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1)
⊣ c0 = c2
⊣ (c0 = c2 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1)
⊣ c0 = c2
⊣ (c0 = c2 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1)
⊣ c0 = c2
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ d(s0, c2)

comment: Equality inference for product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Dec-2017.)
